intro.description: I'm software developer and data analyst, passionate about technology and innovation. Let's work together!

about.title: About me
about.quote: “We are what we constantly do. Excellence is not an event, it is a habit” -Aristotle-
about.name: Danny
about.who_iam: and I am from Colombia. I graduated as a business administrator and worked as a data analyst for several years, but my passion for technology has led me to explore the wonders of software development.
about.now_as: Now as a software developer I like to create strategic solutions that optimize key processes by capturing, transforming and analyzing data to facilitate decision making.
